docPages.title: Intelligent Experience Technical Documentation
docPages.html:
DisFly now offer On-Device Intelligent Experience Technical Documentation

â€”â€” Integration Based on Apple's Foundation Model Framework

Overview

The DisFly application has deeply integrated Apple's Foundation Model Framework (the core technical framework for on-device intelligence) in its latest version, delivering a next-generation intelligent service that runs entirely locally on iOS and macOS devices. This document aims to explain the core value, functional features, and technical details of this upgrade.

Platform Note: All intelligent services described in this document are implemented relying on Apple's native OS frameworks and computational ecosystem. Therefore, they are only available on iOS, iPadOS, and macOS devices and cannot be provided on Android, Windows, or other platforms.

1. Core Philosophy: On-Device Intelligence

Unlike traditional cloud-based AI, all our intelligent processing is performed locally on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac, establishing three core advantages:

  • Absolute Privacy: Your conversation history, browsing data, and creative content never leave your device. Apple's privacy architecture ensures high-security data processing.
  • Instant Response: Eliminates network latency. Intelligent features (like polishing, summarizing, translating) respond as swiftly as native operations.
  • Offline Availability: All intelligent services are fully functional without an internet connection, anywhere.

2. Technical Foundation: Apple Intelligence & Foundation Model Framework

This functionality is part of the Apple Intelligence (Apple's personal intelligence system) experience. We achieve core capabilities by calling the system-level Foundation Model Framework, which is characterized by:

  • Chip-Level Optimization: Models are optimized for the Neural Engine of Apple Silicon (A-series, M-series chips), achieving an optimal balance of high performance and low power consumption.
  • Deep System Integration: As a native framework, it benefits from prioritized system resource scheduling, ensuring stable and efficient service.
  • Multimodal Potential: Lays the groundwork for supporting richer intelligent interactions like images and voice in the future.

To learn more about its technical background, please visit the official Apple introduction: Apple Intelligence Preview.

3. Intelligent Features Overview

3.1 Intelligent Content Processing

  • Instant Summarization: Generates concise and accurate key-point summaries for long posts or complex discussion threads with one tap.
  • Conversation Distillation: Automatically distills lengthy comment threads into clear lists of core viewpoints.

3.2 Writing & Communication Assistance

  • Context-Aware Polishing: Intelligently adjusts the expression of your text based on the community section or selected tone/style.
  • Intelligent Continuation: Provides logical next-sentence suggestions or content expansion while you are composing.
  • Expression Optimization: Identifies and corrects grammatical errors to make expressions more idiomatic and fluent.

3.3 Real-Time Translation

  • Provides fully offline, privacy-preserving, real-time, natural language translation when browsing cross-language content.

3.4 Personalized Experience (Localized)

  • Offers more accurate recommendations for content you might be interested in on the homepage, based entirely on browsing preferences analyzed on-device.

3.5 Accessibility Enhancement

  • Provides smarter, richer context descriptions for screen content used by assistive features like VoiceOver.

4. System Requirements & Notes

  • Supported Platforms & Operating Systems:
    • iOS / iPadOS 18.0 or later
    • macOS Sequoia 15.0 or later
  • Device Requirements: Requires an iPhone, iPad, or Mac with Apple Silicon chips (A17 Pro / M1 or newer) for use.
  • Important Note: This is an Apple-platform exclusive feature, dependent on system-level frameworks. Therefore, it cannot be provided on Android, Windows, or Web clients.
  • Data & Security: All model data is stored in the device's encrypted storage and processed in a secure environment. Neither Apple nor DisFly can access your personal data.

5. Typical Use Cases

  • Scenario 1: Efficient Reading Quickly grasp the core content of a lengthy thousand-word post during your commute using the "Summarize" feature.
  • Scenario 2: Seamless Cross-Language Communication Write replies in your native language in a language learning community, with AI assisting in translation and polishing.
  • Scenario 3: Enhancing Content Quality Use the "Polish" function after drafting a post to make its logic more rigorous and language more impactful.
  • Scenario 4: Creation in Offline Environments Still able to use all AI features to brainstorm and refine your outdoor travelogue in Airplane Mode.

6. Future Roadmap

We will continue to explore the potential of this framework. Future evolution includes:

  • Image Content Understanding: Intelligent recognition and description of information within images in posts.
  • Voice Interaction: Performing actions like posting or searching via voice commands.
  • Deep Personalization Assistant: Building a personal community assistant that understands you better, under the strict premise of privacy protection.

We believe intelligence should serve people while steadfastly guarding everyone's privacy. By integrating Apple's Foundation Model Framework, DisFly offers you a smarter, more private, and faster community experience exclusive to Apple devices.
